body_html:
Okay. I realized that 1 << DBL_MANT_DIG used in previous CPU code is not DBL_MAX. So I fixed those in new commits as well. Now the double random_() should range up to ~2^1024. Same for float.

Also added a check on whether we should use 64bit random numbers as those are twice as expensive.
